tag_list: marketing-executive, project-management, b2b, software-entrepreneur, software-startup, brazil, sao-paulo, bentley-college
overview:
Daniel Kuperman is an experienced marketing executive turned software entrepreneur. His previous work experience includes IT consulting work at KPMG, and Director of Marketing and Product Management at Quadrant Software. Daniel holds a Bachelor degree in Systems Analysis (UNIP, Brazil) and an MBA in IT Strategy (Bentley College). He is also a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) by the PMI.

Daniel is currently the CEO and Co-Founder of Aprix Solutions, Inc., a SaaS based provider of Marketing Resource Management and Marketing Project Management solutions.
